Boolean to indicate if 'Required on Transaction' is enabled in either 'Maintain Related Worktag Usage' or on the Worktag instance.  When you generate an EIB template with data, 'y' is returned when either boolean is true. This boolean is informational only in the 'Put' operation.

For '[AWT]' on [T-New Instance] '[TT]'[colon] [squote][T][squote], specified default value must match an existing allowed value.

Related_Worktag_Widget_Data.description: Allowed and Default Related Worktags Data by Worktag Type.

validation.validation: For '[AWT]' on [T-New Instance] '[TT]'[colon] [squote][T][squote] you cannot specify allowed values as they are not enabled in ‘Maintain Related Worktag Usage’.
For '[AWT]' on [T-New Instance] '[TT]'[colon] [squote][T][squote], Default Worktag field is "Required".
Worktag Type: [AWT]  is not allowed for Taggable Type: [TT]
For '[AWT]' on [T-New Instance] '[TT]'[colon] [squote][T][squote], Delete Allowed Value cannot be 'Y' when all allowed values are being replaced.

For '[AWT]' on [T-New Instance] '[TT]'[colon] [squote][T][squote], when default value and allowed values are being replaced, allowed values in file must be empty or include default value specified in file.

For '[AWT]' on [T-New Instance] '[TT]'[colon] [squote][T][squote], when allowed values are being replaced but existing default value is not being replaced or deleted, allowed values in file must be empty or include existing default value.
For '[AWT]' on [T-New Instance] '[TT]'[colon] [squote][T][squote], you cannot have a 'Default Value' on more than one row.
For '[AWT]' on [T-New Instance] '[TT]'[colon] [squote][T][squote], when default value is being replaced, persisted allowed values must be empty or include default value specified in file.

description: Wrapper element for Student Award Item Data

validation.validation: A unique Student Award Item name is required.
If the Student Award Item is not considered Anticipated Aid, then Anticipated Payment Display Rule cannot be set.
The Award Sort has a maximum length of four and can only contain lowercase letters.
If the Student Award Type is Work-Study, you must provide a Student Work-Study Allocation reference.
A Student Work-Study Allocation cannot be entered unless the Student Award Type is Work-Study.
The selected Disbursement Proration Rule must be configured for the Institution of the selected Academic Unit
The Academic Unit cannot be changed for this Student Award Item.
The Academic Level cannot be changed for this Student Award Item.
Select an Academic Unit and Academic Level for Work-Study Allocation that matches the values you chose for Student Award Item. You can also select a more granular Academic Unit.
You cannot submit a student award item with multiple award limits for the same frequency.
A Work-Study Payment Condition cannot be entered unless the Student Award Type is Work-Study.
Change the Currency to match the default currency for the student's academic unit: [currency]
Academic Period (POS) Load Status or Course Start (POS) Load Status can only be provided if Load Status is a Work-Study Payment Condition.
You must select a Work-Study Load Status of Academic Period (POS) or Course Start (POS) and it's corresponding value.
Student Award Item cannot have both an Academic Period (POS) Load Status and a Course Start (POS) Load Status.
If the federal program ID is a PLUS or graduate PLUS loan, enter Provisional for initial award status.
An Award Item that contains Federal Program ID values of PLUS or Grad PLUS Loan cannot have an Aggregate Limit.
An Award Item that contains Federal Program ID values of PLUS or Grad PLUS Loan cannot be Packaged Once.
An Award Item that contains Federal Program ID values of PLUS or Grad PLUS Loan cannot have Fiscal Limits.
Spend Category is Required, if Disbursable is true.
Select a valid year. The year you selected is not configurable.
Select July 1st to represent the start of the award year.
You can't disburse work-study awards.
If the award type is Loan or Work-Study, enter Accepted, Offered, or Provisional for initial award status.
If the award type is not Loan or Work-Study, enter Accepted or Provisional for initial award status.
You can only select Incomplete Payment Period for a Pell Grant award.
Select a Loan Fee with a compatible academic unit and level.
Select a Anticipated Payment Display Rule with a compatible academic unit and level.
The selected Student Precedence Group must be configured for the Institution of the selected Academic Unit
Select a Fiscal Limit with a compatible academic unit and level.
Select a Student Disbursement Schedule Rule with a compatible academic unit and level.
Provide a different override company. The override company can’t be the same as the company of the institutional academic unit.
Provide a different override company. The override company must belong to a hierarchy that the company of the institutional academic unit also belongs to.
You can’t change the override spend company because this award item has disbursement payments associated with it.
Provide an institutional academic unit. You can only enter an override spend company for award items associated with an institutional academic unit.
Worktag Balancing is enabled for the Company associated with this AU and therefore a default value for the Primary Worktag Balancing Type [fund] must be selected.

One of the selected action items has an Autocomplete Criteria of Direct Loan PLUS Entrance Counseling Completed. In order to select this action item, the Federal Program ID must be Graduate PLUS Loan.
Select a calculation with the same academic unit (or a higher level academic unit) as the award item.
Select a calculation with the same academic unit (or a higher level academic unit) as the award item.
Select a calculation with the same academic unit (or a higher level academic unit) as the award item.
Enter a company and grant combination that matches the company on the award line.
An Award Item that contains Federal Program ID values of PLUS or Grad PLUS Loan cannot have a Student Interim Calculation.
If you're using a student interim calculation, leave the Amount Calculation Reference field empty.
If you're using a student interim calculation, select an award frequency of Academic Period for the student award item.
If the Student Award Type if Work-Study, you must provide a Work Student Payment Limit.
The award item is a Private Loan. Specify a Student Allowable Action value of 'Accepted'.
Private loans can't have more than 4 disbursement lines per award year. Configure a Disbursement Schedule Rule that only has Disbursement Schedules with 2 lines or fewer.
The award item is a Private Loan. Specify an Initial Award Status of 'Accepted'.
You can't specify a No Rounding value because the award item is a Private Loan.
The award item is a Private Loan. Specify a Need Method value of 'EFC Replacement'.
You can't specify a Package Once value because the award item is a Private Loan.
You can’t inactivate award items that have already been packaged.
You can’t update the refundable field for an award item that has already been packaged.
You must specify a Federal Program ID of Direct Unsubsidized Loan because the Package Additional Unsub for Parent PLUS Denials flag is set to True.
validation.description: You must specify a Federal Program ID of Direct Unsubsidized Loan because the Package Additional Unsub for Parent PLUS Denials flag is set to True.

validation.validation: You can't specify a disbursement proration rule when the Type is Loan and the Source is Private.

Reduce_QTRE is an invalid value for the 1098-T_Impact_ID field on student award items. Specify any of these valid values: [ BOX_1_IMPACT_ONLY, BOX_5_IMPACT_ONLY, BOX_1_AND_BOX_5_IMPACT_ONLY, NO_IMPACT ]
Specify "PLUS Loan" as the Federal Program ID if the Do Not Package if Parent has Loans in Default boolean field is true.
